tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.Blue>===New Mods 12-16-2025===</>
S-Variant Dinos, Arkitect Structures Remastered, & MX Shop UI.

<TextStyle.Violet>===Shiny Dinos!===</>

<TextStyle.Orange>Shiny Dinos Settings and Etiquette:</>
Settings: 10 Shinys Max - Level Range 150-180 - Lifespan 5-8hr - Tracker=Enabled - Coordinates on Notification=Enabled
Etiquette: As this is a community server, we value fair play, honesty, and integrity. We ask that there are no 'DIBS' on Shinys that spawn. You can only claim the Shiny, once you have spotted it and are in process of taming it.

==Ark Shop!==

Ark Shop has arrived! Press F3 to view the store. Currency accrued over played time, 15 pts / 30 mins (30 pts / 30 mins Patreons)

tab2.text1:
<TextStyle.Orange>Hey all!!</>

<TextStyle.Green>For those of you that are new or returning welcome(back) to Games Against Humanity Ark server we truly hope you find a comfortable, safe home to play the game we all have a love/hate relationship with. As of January 2024 we'll have been up and running for the better part of 8 years!! It's been a long fun road that I look forward to perpetuating here in the New Year and beyond.</>

<TextStyle.Green>*With that in mind I wanted to remind everyone of what GAH is all about.</>
<TextStyle.Green>We're PVE through and through. So please don't see this as a competition against other players or tribes. I encourage everyone to (re)read the server & Community rules.  https://discord.com/channels/275780404475330560/637534780342272011</>

<TextStyle.Green>* I do encourage players to help each other both new and old players alike. This not only helps build our community but it's hard evidence that everyone is welcome here. Please do not force or guilt-trip anyone into playing a specific way.</>

<TextStyle.Green>* Play the way that's best and most relaxing to YOU. Live and let live.</>

<TextStyle.Green>We very much adhere to the first-come-first-serve rule of discovery. Trust, me there's enough to go around.</>

<TextStyle.Green>* Lastly please allows the Admin team some grace, none of us get paid to run this and I promise you, it's not easy. Also, DO NOT BE AFRAID TO PING</> <TextStyle.Violet>@Ark Admins</> <TextStyle.Green>when/if needed, but also please check the global chat to see if a problem has already been announced.  We all have families and jobs that take precedence.  I promise you that we'll address issues as quickly as possible.</>


<TextStyle.Green>A few rules I wanted to mention here:</>

<TextStyle.Green>-1.1. Treat all members with respect.</>
<TextStyle.Green>-1.2 Harassment, racist, homophobic, screen names, hate speech or any kind of discriminatory speech, images or abuse, will NOT be tolerated.</>
<TextStyle.Green>-1.3. Racial or offensive slurs will not be tolerated.</>

<TextStyle.Green>-2.3. No Stealing or ninja looting from others. Beacons & Rare Tames are first come (see it), first serve. Same goes all special event drops.</>

<TextStyle.Green>**Violations of our rules will result in permeant ban from all GAH games/community**. I as owner have final say, but I listen to the counsel of my entire Admin team on all matters.  I will listen to both sides of any and all arguments before coming to a decision. That said, I trust all my admin staff to do the same. We're all reasonable adults.</>

<TextStyle.Green>Please, have fun and as always DON'T DIE!!!!</>

<TextStyle.Orange>~Nails; GAH Co-Founder/Owner</>

tab3.text1:
NOTE: These are our standard settings across all maps and does not include special event settings/boosts.

-Allow Cave Building-Off
-Allow Cave Flyers-Off
-Allow Flyer Carry-On
-Allow Tribe Imprinting-On
-Allow Unlimited Respecs-On
-Baby Mature Speed-x6
-Egg Hatch Speed-x6
-SupplyCrateLootQualityMultiplier-x1
-Fishing Loot Quality Multiplier-x1.5
-Global Spoiling Time Multiplier-x1.5
-Harvesting Rate-x3
-Lay Egg Interval Multiplier-x0.25
-Mating Interval-x0.14
-PvE Friendly Fire-On **Tribe mates only.
-Structure Decay-On
-Taming Speed-x3
-XP Multiplier-x2

tab4.text1:
Greetings everyone, I am Leathon, the event coordinator of the GAH cluster for ark. There will be the SE event SOon

========The Aspects of the Event========

Unknown

========The Goal=========

The goal of this event is to tell a different story on a group ascending, one that uses smaller dinos and help from others to achieve this goal and move to the next ark in line. It also will be a way for one to acquire things in different ways, make no mistake it will still take work but if your tired of grinding for metal other options will open up based on the campaignâ€™s choices that you may as a community member decide to participate in.

=======The Dino Classifications that are allowed in the event===========

**See Discord for PDF Links**

=======Saddle Durability System========

Starting Saddle Threshold: 80
Saddle Threshold Limit: 120
Start Saddle Proficiency Stat: 0
Success chance of deflecting attack: 16 or higher
Small Dino Saddle Proficiency Stat: +4
